text: Yalli isi farmoytal boylak (xannabak) qeb maliinoh magaaloolî marak waaseeh gacsem, toysa Yallaa kee Yallih farmoytih iimi, Kaadu Yallih farmoytal ramadah xayih yan maraay, qayxiixaay, tumaleelaa kee gexsô (musaafirtu) maray sakyi kak yiggiriqqeh iimi, Yalli tama mekla kah abem cagalah maali siinik gaddaloolâ fanal tabantabe waankeh iyyaanama, Kaadu isin Yallih farmoyti siinih baahem beetaay elle taamita, kaadu usuk sin kak waaseemik waasima, Kaadu Yallak meesita, diggah Yalli usuk gibdi digaalá lek
